items.sentence: The main street is filled with girls in kimonos.
I couldn't run fast enough to catch up with Tom.
Tom said he intended to take the matter further.
Tom's comments to the press caused quite a stir.
Tom should be landing in Boston right about now.
Tom said he needed some time to work things out.
The man who lives next to Tom is quite peculiar.
Tom needs someone who is able to understand him.
Tom volunteered to go to the hospital with Mary.
Tom says he doesn't know any of Mary's children.
